name: caseflow-ai
description: **React + TypeScript + Node.js + PostgreSQL + OpenAI + Elasticsearch + Docker + AWS-ready**

scripts.wait:elastic: powershell -Command "Write-Host '⏳ Waiting for Elasticsearch...'; $maxRetries=15; $count=0; while ($count -lt $maxRetries) { try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:9200' -UseBasicParsing -TimeoutSec 3; if ($response.StatusCode -eq 200) { Write-Host '✅ Elasticsearch is ready!'; exit 0 } } catch { Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; $count++ } }; Write-Host '❌ Elasticsearch not ready in time.'; exit 1"
scripts.start:server: npm run wait:elastic && cd server && npm run dev
scripts.start:all: npm run docker:down && concurrently "npm run start:docker" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
